title: Installation issue: sundials 4.0.1 has broken headers in arkode
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install dealii
In file included from /Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/dealii-develop-5vwbosjcavai5ao5mccewnakp3wupaz6/dealii/source/sundials/arkode.cc:19:
In file included from /Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/dealii-develop-5vwbosjcavai5ao5mccewnakp3wupaz6/dealii/include/deal.II/sundials/arkode.h:38:
/Users/davydden/spack/opt/spack/darwin-mojave-x86_64/clang-10.0.0-apple/sundials-4.0.1-5za3vcazzodfej5awpcbaxjp6amhpntq/include/arkode/arkode_impl.h:27:10: fatal error: 'arkode_adapt_impl.h' file not found
#include "arkode_adapt_impl.h"
         ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
1 error generated.
```

notice that `deal.II` only includes `arkode.h`, which includes `arkode_impl.h` and that one expects `arkode_adapt_impl.h` to be around. It's not the the `sundials` installation prefix:

```
$ ls ~/spack/opt/spack/darwin-mojave-x86_64/clang-10.0.0-apple/sundials-4.0.1-5za3vcazzodfej5awpcbaxjp6amhpntq/include/arkode/
arkode.h		arkode_arkstep.h	arkode_bandpre.h	arkode_bbdpre.h		arkode_butcher.h	arkode_butcher_dirk.h	arkode_butcher_erk.h	arkode_erkstep.h	arkode_impl.h		arkode_ls.h		arkode_mristep.h
```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Darwin 18.2.0 Darwin Kernel Version 18.2.0: Mon Nov 12 20:24:46 PST 2018; root:xnu-4903.231.4~2/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64
``` 
appeared after https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/10306 which made `4.x` default, there was no issue with `3.2.1`. 


@cswoodward @gardner48 @balos1 ping.
